title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 15.11 - Garbage; refuse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 15.11 - Garbage; refuse

State Regulations

An adequate number of covered storage receptacles shall be provided and used for the storage of garbage and refuse. The storage receptacles shall be constructed of durable, cleanable materials and be maintained in a sanitary condition and in good repair. Garbage and refuse shall not be allowed to accumulate on the surface of the ground. Notes

15.11

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
